item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-04-19
item.description: Facebook plans to go after Clubhouse — and podcasts — with a suite of new audio products (4 minute read) Facebook is planning to announce a series of social audio products, including an audio-only version of Rooms, a Clubhouse-like product, a feature that will allow users to record and post brief voice messages, and a podcast discovery service.
